docs.snippet: Chris Rusin threw four scoreless innings, while Donnie Murphy, Daniel Vogelbach, and Arismendy Alcantara each homered to lead the Chicago Cubs to a 6-3 victory over the New York Mets with both teams playing with split squads Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Rusin threw four scoreless innings, while Donnie Murphy, Daniel Vogelbach, and Arismendy Alcantara each homered to lead the Chicago Cubs to a 6-3 victory over the New York Mets with both teams playing with split squads Sunday.

headline.main: Rusin Strong as Cubs Top Mets 6-3
headline.print_headline: Rusin Strong as Cubs Top Mets 6-3

docs.snippet: CC Sabathia pitched five hitless innings Sunday and the New York Yankees split squad bounced back after getting no-hit a day earlier to beat the Miami Marlins 7-0 in Mariano Rivera's home country....
docs.lead_paragraph: CC Sabathia pitched five hitless innings Sunday and the New York Yankees split squad bounced back after getting no-hit a day earlier to beat the Miami Marlins 7-0 in Mariano Rivera's home country.

headline.main: Sabathia Pitches 5 Hitless Innings, Yankees Win
headline.print_headline: Sabathia Pitches 5 Hitless Innings, Yankees Win

docs.snippet: Ennio Morricone, who has composed music for more than 450 films, is being celebrated in a three-day program at the Brooklyn Academy of Music....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ennio Morricone, who has composed music for more than 450 films, is being celebrated in a three-day program at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
docs.abstract: Ennio Morricone, who has composed music for more than 450 films, is being celebrated in three-day program at Brooklyn Academy of Music; Morricone reflects on six decades of music.

headline.seo: Ennio Morricone, the Film Composer, Celebrated

docs.snippet: The artist Oscar Murillo, who just turned 28, has experienced the wild ride from struggling art student to a hot star in the art world firmament....
docs.lead_paragraph: The artist Oscar Murillo, who just turned 28, has experienced the wild ride from struggling art student to a hot star in the art world firmament.
docs.abstract: Artist Oscar Murillo is being called 21st-century Basquiat by his fans, but he is trying to tune out noise of marketplace and keep his eyes on his work; 28-year-old has experienced wild ride from struggling art student to current hot star of art world; Murillo's story reflects way investing in contemporary art has become gamble, like stocks and real estate.

headline.seo: Oscar Murillo Keeps His Eyes on the Canvas

docs.snippet: In an era of freewheeling trades in pro sports and college conferences extending outside of regions, should fans still care about rivalries?...
docs.abstract: In an era of freewheeling trades in pro sports and college conferences extending outside of regions, should fans still care about rivalries?

headline.main: Fans and the Foes They Love to Hate
